Author: EzraCelestine
Text: Drunk me gets very worried about everyone and also has no filter and long story short I accidentally made a girl cry a few years back cause I noticed she had Russell's Sign and I like, got her away from the rest of the party to ask about it and if she needed someone to talk to and she kinda broke down cause she'd never told anyone about it at all and she vented a ton and it was like. Good catharsis for her (she said so I'm not just assuming) but let me tell ya there are few feelings worse than the one you get by asking "hey are you okay" and pointing at someone's knuckles and them *immediately* breaking into choming sobs

Author: veronika-k15
Text: Thank you! Usually no one notices but they have become very visible recently.   I'll give sunscreen a go!
